column5: Looking for a lodge in this area that is fisherman friendly (not necessarily family oriented).  I would like to fish for walleye and muskey.  Any suggestions would be appreciated.
Might want to look for something on the Ottawa, if so don't forget the cats!!

Round Lake near Havelock comes to mind. It has a Lodge.  Bayview Cottages: P.O. Box 99, Havelock, ON Bill and Deborah Coene: 705 778 2023.  The lake has Walleye, and Musky, and isn't too big, so it doesn't get too rough if it gets windy.  .
